title: Avonvale Bowls Club
summary: Designed and developed a new website using Next.js and TypeScript for a Bristol-based bowls club.* Implemented a frontend architecture to enhance user experience and performance.* Integrated Contentful, a headless CMS, to manage dynamic content such as fixtures, results, news posts, and photos.* Enabled easy content updates and publishing capabilities through Contentful, ensuring flexibility and scalability for future enhancements.
